Summary: there were twelve of them in a perfect circ;le east....i thought it might be a portal
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Powell River
There were no other sightings in Powell River on or around October 16th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was visiting my daughter at a farm. I was with a friend. We were walking back from the beach when I first noticed it. What made me notice it, was that it was a perfect large circle. It must have been at least a mile wide. Starlike in appearance. We were in awe of it. I have never personally seen anything like that. I have seen other ufos in my lifetime. As well as been abducted etc. I didn't have any fear. My girlfriend and I knew it wasn't of this earth. It wasn't stars in alignment. Unfortunately, we didn't have a camera with us at the time. We didn't actually lose sight of it. It stayed for a very long time. We went back to the farm.
